Reviews.Title: Sub-par when it works
Reviews.Author: B. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Intermittently freezes up. Needs to be reset. I've been experiencing this every few hours.Once it's working, it works okay, but then abruptly freezes.Setup constantly wants to default to "espanol." This isn't a huge deal, but it's quite an annoyance.Setup is wonky and even freezes during that sometimes.Will not pick up any channels above 11.It functions in 3 different modes, though, so at least that's good.I have a Huawei sim-card wifi hotspot, so I figured they make decent products. Meh...

Reviews.Title: Fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Jie Chen
Reviews.Content: fast shipping good products  only things is that I got nonenglish installation book so I have to find out online but not big deal

Reviews.Title: Good quality and robust design
Reviews.Author: Saeed Maleksaeedi
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Only problem was that the manual was in Spanish, not English. I had to download the manual from internet.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good.
Reviews.Author: Mrs
Reviews.Content: Pretty good one but from time to time it needs to be reset... it took as a while how to set it up but at the end it wasn't so complicated as we first thought.
